document.full_text: chrysler group llc became the latest automaker affected by the japan earthquake and its aftermath, as it said it would cancel overtime work at some of its north american assembly plants due to parts shortages.
document.title: chrysler cuts plants' overtime for parts shortages
lines_and_colors: chrysler group llc became the latest automaker affected by the japan earthquake and its aftermath, as it said it would cancel overtime work at some of its north american assembly plants due to parts shortages.
